title: Learning Analytics-Driven Instructional Design to Improve MOOC Engagement and Retention Rates

context.additional_context: Project-based assessment for novice learners in social studies, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify individual learning patterns with over 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools on MOOC platforms
Learners can achieve a weekly learning completion rate of 70% or higher through personalized feedback based on learning analytics
Through collaborative activities with peers, learners can improve the completeness and submission rates of project-based assessments by 65% or more

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
